00016 class MarbleTexture : public Texture<Spectrum> {
00017 public:
00018         // MarbleTexture Public Methods
00019         ~MarbleTexture() {
00020                 delete mapping;
00021         }
00022         MarbleTexture(int oct, float roughness, float sc, float var,
00023                         TextureMapping3D *map) {
00024                 omega = roughness;
00025                 octaves = oct;
00026                 mapping = map;
00027                 scale = sc;
00028                 variation = var;
00029         }
00030         Spectrum Evaluate(const DifferentialGeometry &dg) const {
00031                 Vector dpdx, dpdy;
00032                 Point P = mapping->Map(dg, &dpdx, &dpdy);
00033                 P *= scale;
00034                 float marble = P.y + variation * FBm(P, scale * dpdx,
00035                         scale * dpdy, omega, octaves);
00036                 float t = .5f + .5f * sinf(marble);
00037                 // Evaluate marble spline at _t_
00038                 static float c[][3] = { { .58f, .58f, .6f }, { .58f, .58f, .6f }, { .58f, .58f, .6f },
00039                         { .5f, .5f, .5f }, { .6f, .59f, .58f }, { .58f, .58f, .6f },
00040                         { .58f, .58f, .6f }, {.2f, .2f, .33f }, { .58f, .58f, .6f }, };
00041                 #define NC  sizeof(c) / sizeof(c[0])
00042                 #define NSEG (NC-3)
00043                 int first = Floor2Int(t * NSEG);
00044                 t = (t * NSEG - first);
00045                 Spectrum c0(c[first]), c1(c[first+1]), c2(c[first+2]), c3(c[first+3]);
00046                 // Bezier spline evaluated with de Castilejau's algorithm
00047                 Spectrum s0 = (1.f - t) * c0 + t * c1;
00048                 Spectrum s1 = (1.f - t) * c1 + t * c2;
00049                 Spectrum s2 = (1.f - t) * c2 + t * c3;
00050                 s0 = (1.f - t) * s0 + t * s1;
00051                 s1 = (1.f - t) * s1 + t * s2;
00052                 // Extra scale of 1.5 to increase variation among colors
00053                 return 1.5f * ((1.f - t) * s0 + t * s1);
00054         }
00055 private:
00056         // MarbleTexture Private Data
00057         int octaves;
00058         float omega, scale, variation;
00059         TextureMapping3D *mapping;
00060 };
